content.rendered:
The University Community is advised that the intercampus shuttle pickup and dropoff point is back to GATE 8 – HOWARD COLLEGE CAMPUS. The shuttle operates during term-time on weekdays, excluding public holidays and weekends, from 07h30 until 20h30 as per the attached timetable.

The intercampus shuttle provides service to UKZN registered students and staff who commute between Howard College and Westville Campuses on university academic-related business. The route permit awarded to the service provider Ikhwezi Bus Service (Pty) Ltd only allows them to pick up and drop off at Gate 8 – Howard College Campus and at Joosub Hall (Main Hall) and Makhabane bus stop on the Westville campus. Commuters using this service are required to produce their student or staff card. Should anyone be unable to produce the card, they will not be allowed to board the bus.

We urge commuters to be at the bus stop on time to board the bus in an orderly manner, observing all covid-19 related protocols and refraining from disruptive behaviour. This contravenes traffic laws and poses a security risk to staff, students, and the service provider. 

For any enquiries please contact:

Mrs Nokwanda Jali
Office of Executive Director: Student Services
L Block, Level 0, Suite 25
Westville Campus
Tel: +27 31 260 2251
Fax: +27 31 260 2190
E-mail: jalin@ukzn.ac.za

INTERCAMPUS SHUTTLE SERVICE – SECOND SEMESTER 2022

Gate 8 Howard College Joosub (Main) Hall Westville
07h30 07h30
11h30 11h30
17h00 17h00
20h30 20h30

REVISED INTERCAMPUS SHUTTLE TIMETABLE FOR THE STUDENT MID-TERM BREAK, 26-30 SEPTEMBER 2022

Gate 8 Howard College Joosub (Main) Hall Westville
07h30 07h30
14h00 14h00
18h15 18h15
